description: ff. 100. 175 x 130; 118 x 71 mm. 15 lin. 16th cen. Anonymous glosses on selected traditions from al-Ṣaghānī's work, dedicated to the sultan Bāyazīd II (d. 918/1512). ḥājjī Khalīfah, Kashf al-ẓunūn, V, 593, no. 12228 (anon.). Incip.: ... بتحمىد ربنا وهو ولى حمىد ... وبعد فلما امرت بالتدرىس والتعلىم
title: Maṭāliʻ al-asrār li-kitāb Mashāriq al-anwār.
subject: Ṣaghānī, al-ḥasan ibn Muḥammad, 1181-1252—Mashāriq al-anwār al-nabawīyah
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
